cvmx_dfa_command_t Union Reference

These structures define a DFA instruction. More...

#include <cvmx-dfa.h>

struct {
   uint64_t   gxor:8
 Graph XOR value (PASS3/CN58XX), Must be zero for other chips or if DFA_CFG[GXOR_ENA] == 0.
   uint64_t   nxoren:1
 Node XOR enable (PASS3/CN58XX), Must be zero for other chips or if DFA_CFG[NXOR_ENA] == 0.
   uint64_t   nreplen:1
 Node Replication mode enable (PASS3/CN58XX), Must be zero for other chips or if DFA_CFG[NRPL_ENA] == 0 or IWORD0[Ty] == 0.
   uint64_t   start_node:22
 Node to start the walk from, includes ID and snrepl, see notes above.
   uint64_t   unused02:2
 Must be zero.

 Type of memory replication to use.

 Must be zero.

 Type of graph.

 Must be zero.

 All tables start on 1KB boundary.
   uint64_t   input_length:16
 In bytes, # pointers in gather case.
   uint64_t   use_gather:1
 Set to use gather.
   uint64_t   no_L2_alloc:1
 Set to disable loading of the L2 cache by the DFA.
   uint64_t   full_block_write:1
 If set, HW can write entire cache blocks @ result_ptr.
   uint64_t   little_endian:1
 Affects only packet data, not instruction, gather list, or result.
   uint64_t   unused1:8
 Must be zero.

 Either directly points to data or the gather list.

 in 64-bit quantities, mbz for store

 Must be zero.
   uint64_t   result_ptr:36
 must be 128 byte aligned
   uint64_t   tsize:8
 tsize*256 is the number of terminal nodes for GRAPH_TYPE_SM
   uint64_t   msize:16
 msize is the number of marked nodes for GRAPH_TYPE_SM
   uint64_t   unused3:4
 Must be zero.

struct {

Detailed Description

These structures define a DFA instruction.

Field Documentation

struct { ... }
uint64_t cvmx_dfa_command_t::base

All tables start on 1KB boundary.

uint64_t cvmx_dfa_command_t::data_ptr

Either directly points to data or the gather list.

If gather list, data_ptr<2:0> must be zero (i.e. 8B aligned)

uint64_t cvmx_dfa_command_t::full_block_write

If set, HW can write entire cache blocks @ result_ptr.

uint64_t cvmx_dfa_command_t::gxor

Graph XOR value (PASS3/CN58XX), Must be zero for other chips or if DFA_CFG[GXOR_ENA] == 0.

uint64_t cvmx_dfa_command_t::input_length

In bytes, # pointers in gather case.

uint64_t cvmx_dfa_command_t::little_endian

Affects only packet data, not instruction, gather list, or result.

uint64_t cvmx_dfa_command_t::max_results

in 64-bit quantities, mbz for store

uint64_t cvmx_dfa_command_t::msize

msize is the number of marked nodes for GRAPH_TYPE_SM

uint64_t cvmx_dfa_command_t::no_L2_alloc

Set to disable loading of the L2 cache by the DFA.

uint64_t cvmx_dfa_command_t::nreplen

Node Replication mode enable (PASS3/CN58XX), Must be zero for other chips or if DFA_CFG[NRPL_ENA] == 0 or IWORD0[Ty] == 0.

uint64_t cvmx_dfa_command_t::nxoren

Node XOR enable (PASS3/CN58XX), Must be zero for other chips or if DFA_CFG[NXOR_ENA] == 0.

cvmx_llm_replication_t cvmx_dfa_command_t::replication

Type of memory replication to use.

uint64_t cvmx_dfa_command_t::result_ptr

must be 128 byte aligned

struct { ... } cvmx_dfa_command_t::s
uint64_t cvmx_dfa_command_t::start_node

Node to start the walk from, includes ID and snrepl, see notes above.

uint64_t cvmx_dfa_command_t::tsize

tsize*256 is the number of terminal nodes for GRAPH_TYPE_SM

cvmx_dfa_graph_type_t cvmx_dfa_command_t::type

Type of graph.

uint32_t cvmx_dfa_command_t::u32
uint64_t cvmx_dfa_command_t::u64
uint64_t cvmx_dfa_command_t::unused02

Must be zero.

uint64_t cvmx_dfa_command_t::unused03

Must be zero.

uint64_t cvmx_dfa_command_t::unused04

Must be zero.

uint64_t cvmx_dfa_command_t::unused1

Must be zero.

uint64_t cvmx_dfa_command_t::unused2

Must be zero.

uint64_t cvmx_dfa_command_t::unused3

Must be zero.

uint64_t cvmx_dfa_command_t::use_gather

Set to use gather.

cvmx_dfa_word0_t cvmx_dfa_command_t::word0
cvmx_dfa_word1_t cvmx_dfa_command_t::word1
cvmx_dfa_word2_t cvmx_dfa_command_t::word2

uint64_t cvmx_dfa_command_t::wq_ptr

0 for no work queue entry creation
